item.title: Playing with cabal
item.description: Cabal is a “experimental p2p community chat platform”. It’s fully distributed over the dat protocol. When you create a new chat area – something like a Slack – it allows anyone with the same key to post and view messages everywhere. When you post a message, everyone gets it and shares it with everyone else, so even when your computer drops off there will still be a coherent view of the data.
